summary: Part of the Bronze Weapon Set
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: The Damage stat on my screenshot is altered by Requiem. This will not affect your Bronze Dagger (Dam:8 or 9)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

UPDATE: (15/12/2012)

*** Added a Worn Ceremonial Texture to the Standalone weapon.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey guys,

I Have engraved this little beauty of a dagger with a White Rose on the Blade. 


FEATURES: (Comparsion to Vanilla Steel Dagger)
The Bronze Dagger is slightly faster,stronger & lighter

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INFORMATION on how to get the FONT & HUD I use (I didn\'t make these lol)

Smaller Kingthings Petrock fonts                    by Eckhart
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20773

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My Heads up display is:  

Sky UI 3.0 - Alpha 6
https://github.com/downloads/schlangster/skyui/SkyUI_3.0-alpha6.7z


Bare in mind it\'s an alpha so it\'s a bit more buggy than Sky UI 2.2 (found on this Nexusmods)

Hope that helps guys 

:)
author: Elgar2389
